<template>
  <van-loading vertical color="#1989fa" size="30" class="loadd">
    <template #icon>
      <van-icon name="star-o" size="30" />
    </template>
    视频有点大，还在加载哦...
  </van-loading>
  <video src="../assets/video.mp4" autoplay @ended="overAudio" @play="onPlay"></video>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "myShiPing",
  methods: {
    onPlay() {
      console.log("开始播放")
    },
    overAudio() {
      console.log("播放完毕")
      this.$router.push('/xiangCe')
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    let videoElem = document.querySelector("video")
    videoElem.addEventListener('canplaythrough', () => { 
      
    });
  }

}
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>
video {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  // position: absolute;
}
.loadd {
  po
}
</style>
